name: Apollo's Prison 3D
description:
• GAME RECOVERED ON: NOVEMBER 27th, 2022
  • GAME CREATED: 199X
  • MEDIUM: FLOPPY DISC (3.5' FLOPPY)

BELOW IS A TRANSCRIPT OF WHAT WAS WRITTEN WITH THE GAME FILE:

The year is 2035, You are a lone prisoner in one of many privately owned prisons operated by the Onyx Corporation. You pick up a gun and you start your life on the run.

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D Or Arrows - Movement

R - Reload

Spacebar - Interact

CREDITS:

  • Sinclair (https://twitter.com/SinclairThe3rd) - Gun Images
  • Google Fonts - Typefaces
  • Textures - Edited textures from https://textures.com
  • Sounds - https://freesound.org
  • You! For playing and voting!

JAM VERSION, UPDATES COMING SOON :)
